programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: Ancient Structures: Certain structures on our planet have stood the test of time and continue to astonish mankind - so much so, that alien intervention has not been ruled out. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: Hotspots: Some places are known for so many reports of UAP sightings that people flock from all around the world, just to catch a glimpse of a flying saucer. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Lightning Strikes, Human Hibernation, Chinese Anchors: A man survives six lightning strikes, while a toddler is frozen solid and thawed unharmed. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Final Decision: Les reveals to Seth and Ashley whether he'll buy the new pawn shop, but his decision has bigger consequences than anyone could imagine. (S5, ep 2)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Aliens & Superheroes: Experts investigate whether ancient tales of beings with super-human powers could be inspired by extra-terrestrials who came to Earth in the past. (S6, ep 13)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Tesla Experiment: Inventor Nikola Tesla claimed to have direct communication with beings on other planets. Could this genius scientist have been a human 'receiver'? (S6, ep 14)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 28)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S9, ep 2)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole, Allen Millyard and Guy Willison visit Phil and Annika's maze-like sheds, where they find a pair of 1940s motorbikes. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Yo! Mary Raps: There are surprises in store in Dallas, where Mary reveals a very different side to her personality. A discovery leads Ricky and Bubba to a den of deviance. (S5, ep 10)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Shop Rock: A blade rumoured to belong to a Japanese WWII admiral attracts Rick's attention.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Les Hunts A Thief: Les goes on the rampage when he finds out a thief has been on his premises. Plus, a customer selling a guitar signed by Kid Rock reveals a valuable secret. (S5, ep 7)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Full Metal Panic: Ashley comes out from behind the security glass to confront a menacing customer. Later, there's more trouble when a man claims he is robbed in the pawn shop. (S5, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Dirty Tape: Ashley's head is put on the chopping block when Seth and Les discover she's to blame for the shop's current cash crisis. (S5, ep 9)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: What Lies Below: UAPs have been seen entering the ocean at high speeds - and since our oceans can be as deep as six miles, were the UAPs simply trying to get home? (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Paradox: As the Fermi Paradox states, the likelihood of advanced life in the universe is surprisingly high - so why haven't we had any contact with extraterrestrial life? (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: A Frequency Occurrence: When an indigenous sound ritual is performed on Skinwalker Ranch, the team is amazed by the phenomena that are revealed. (S4, ep 10)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: The UFO Files: In this special, Tony Harris reviews the latest developments and most compelling photographic evidence from a tumultuous year of UFO revelations. (S4, ep 8)

programme.title: Secrets In The Jungle
programme.desc: Secret Structures of Guatemala: Archaeologists identify a site containing unknown structures. A lake full of jellyfish is studied and Argentinian researchers make a discovery. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Sin City Sucker Punch: An old rivalry resurfaces in Vegas, before a locker reveals a covered item that's thought to be a vintage car - but will the buyer drive away happy? (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Now You See It, Now You Don't: A mega-find leaves the winning bidder scratching his head - but when the item's true nature is revealed, he'll be swimming in more than just cash. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: New: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole, Allen Millyard and Guy Willison are back! This time, they revamp their stall after picking up a vanload of trinkets. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Special
programme.desc: Mysterious Devices: Experts check out a 2,000-year-old computer, a power plant inside the Great Pyramid and a Nazi-era time machine. Could they have been built with extraterrestrial help?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Special
programme.desc: Alien Transports: Ancient cultures tell stories of strange objects seen flying in the sky. But are these tales fiction? Or could people thousands of years ago have witnessed spacecrafts?

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: Physical Evidence: Physical evidence of alien activity has been hidden from the public for years - but it is starting to be revealed. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Wonders of the Universe: It is likely that aliens exist in a universe as large as ours. How would they navigate those vast distances and potentially visit us on earth? (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There: Alien Edition
programme.desc: Bizarre UFO Shapes: A family captures a rectangular UFO, while experts analyse T-shaped and cylindrical objects to uncover the truth about UFOs. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: Four US Air Force reservists are pursued by odd lights. Constable Alan Godfrey loses consciousness when he investigates a strange disruption in West Yorkshire. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: A hitchhiker is terrified when lights appear to attack him. A sighting in France becomes one of the most investigated cases in UFO history. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lynn is Linc's stunt double in 'Steeling Thunder', then in 'Be Careful What you Fish For', a fishing trip becomes a hunt for Gramps nemesis. (S8, ep 2)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Draculaura gives her dance partner, Clawd, enchanted dancing shoes in 'Out Of Step', then in 'Pyramid Scheme', Cleo raids her family's ancient tomb for a perfect, superior costume. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: He Got Game Night: Hank raises the stakes of family game night to a new high, and each member of the family will do whatever it takes to win the grand prize. (S3, ep 15)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Kiss Me, Nate: Max is nervous when his girlfriend auditions for the romantic lead opposite a cute boy in the school play, and he convinces Phoebe to audition for the same role. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Space Invaders, Part 1: When Captain Man and Kid Danger find out that an astronaut has been taken hostage on the Space Station, they use Schwoz's shuttle to head into space. (S3, ep 12)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Space Invaders, Part 2: Captain Man & Kid Danger discover who has taken the astronauts hostage. After realizing the astronauts are not so innocent, their alleigances change. (S3, ep 13)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: The Plan: To save Erik, the kids must get the vase out of Lucia's house before the police discover it. While Evie has her first day at school, the others plan to retrieve the hidden vase. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Wild stays in Papa Smurf's house in 'The Guest Who Wouldn't Leave', then in 'Where's My Smurfway?', Blossom misplaces Brainy's beloved Smurfway, and has to find it before Brainy finds out. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Waffles and Punishment: When Storm gets close to beating him in a waffle-eating contest, Greedy takes the competition too far. (S2, ep 16a)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide Grumpy Pants needs more excitement in 'Bucket Pants', then in 'A Best Too Far', Best listens to other people's ideas during the Capture the Flag contest. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing in 'Appointment TV', and then in 'Karen's Virus', Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddy's hometown in 'Bubbletown', and in 'Girls' Night Out', Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.desc: Mae Abel wedi cysgu'n hwyr ac mae Digbi a'i ffrindiau yn teimlo'n ddi-amynedd gan bod y siop ar gau. Frustrated his friends can't buy anything from Abel's shop, Digbi opens his own store.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Cari a'i ffrindiau'n derbyn gwahoddiad i achlysur arbennig iawn. Tybed beth yw'r achlysur? Cari and her friends receive an invitation to a special event. What can it be?

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae'r Abadas yn mwynhau chwarae gm o bl-droed ar y traeth nes i'r gwynt gipio'r bl. On the beach, the Abadas find out that a 'ball' isn't the only thing that moves in the wind.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Daw criw o robotiaid i helpu Blero a'i ffrindiau i godi pont arbennig, ac mae Al Tal yn profi ei bod yn ddiogel. Blero and friends are joined by a group of robots to build a bridge.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd

programme.title: Olobobs

programme.title: We Were Strangers
programme.desc: 1949. Adventure. Director: John Huston. Stars John Garfield, Jennifer Jones, Gilbert Roland. A Cuban American returns home to craft a plan to lure the country's corrupt leaders into a deadly trap.

programme.title: The Leather Boys
programme.desc: 1964. Drama. Directed by Sidney J. Furie. Stars Rita Tushingham, Colin Campbell & Dudley Sutton. The swift marriage of a young couple begins to crumble after husband Reggie meets a handsome biker. [S]

programme.title: Mr Kingstreet's War
programme.desc: 1972. Thriller. During WWII, American couple Mr Kingstreet (John Saxon) and Maggie (Tippi Hedren), run a reserve that is located between British and Italian colonies in South Africa. [S]

programme.title: A View from a Hill
programme.desc: 2005. Horror. Director: Luke Watson. Stars Mark Letheren, Pip Torrens & David Burke. A historian is sent to verify an archaeological collection. Whilst there he discovers a gruesome local legend. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Mother Hubbard Case. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. Sherlock Holmes tracks down a murderer who lures victims to empty houses, where they are killed. [S]

programme.title: Demobbed
programme.desc: 1944. Comedy. Demobbed from the army, four troublesome soldiers are reunited with their old Sergeant. Starring Norman Evans, Nat Jackley and Dan Young. Directed by John E Blakely. [S]

programme.title: Royal Family at War
programme.desc: 1995. Documentary. Narrated by Peter Williams. An intriguing insight into the lives of the Royal Family during WWII, with personal accounts from those who had surrounded them throughout the war. [S]

programme.title: First Comes Courage
programme.desc: 1943. War. Directed by Dorothy Arzner. Stars Merle Oberon, Brian Aherne & Carl Esmond. A member of the Norwegian resistance faces complications when a British commando falls in love with her. [S]

programme.title: The Hasty Heart
programme.desc: 1949. Richard Todd, Ronald Reagan & Patricia Neal star in this sensitive adaptation of John Patrick's play focusing on a soldier with little time left, & the friendships he makes with those around him

programme.title: A Little of What You Fancy
programme.desc: 1968. A loving tribute to British Music Hall with Lily Morris & Gus Elen. Featuring original archive film, rare prints, portraits and photographs, it traces what remains of the great music halls. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Tables of the Heart - Part 1. 1973. Stars Nick Tate, Barbara Lott & Richard Leech. Surgeon, Stephen Saul, faces charges of criminal assault and of causing the death of his patient Eric Maple. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Tables of the Heart - Part 2. 1973. Stars Richard Leech & David Ashford. Sir Austin Semple gives his opinion on Eric Maple's heart condition and Charles Lotterby makes his counter statements. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Tables of the Heart - Part 3. 1973. Stars Nick Tate, Jonathan Elsom & Frank Moorey. Stephen Saul faces a tough cross examination and Dr. Venning gives evidence in his defence. [S]

programme.title: The Long Memory
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Directed by Robert Hamer. Stars John Mills, Elizabeth Sellars, John McCallum & Geoffrey Keen. Released from prison after 12 years, a man seeks revenge on those who lied at his trial. [S]

programme.title: Aberdeen: The Silver City
programme.desc: A late 60s local authority travelogue showcasing the wonders of the great Scottish city of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Those British Faces
programme.desc: 1993. Documentary series that acts as a tribute to the greats of British cinema. This episode focuses on a brilliant tribute to Anna Neagle. [S]

programme.title: The Cheaters
programme.desc: Libel. 1961. Stars John Ireland & Philip Latham. Two investment brokers sue a newspaper for an article claiming they worked for the Nazis. Eastern Insurance must prove the story is not libellous. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: The Chosen Victim. 1976. Stars Patrick O'Connell, Derek Benfield & Kate O'Mara. An upward drift in Hammond stock rouses Brian's interest. Meanwhile, Jennifer and Ted receive bad news from Barbara. [S]

programme.title: Travelling Man
programme.desc: A Token Attempt. 1985. Stars Leigh Lawson, Dee Sadler & Terry Taplin. Lomax is persuaded by the journalist, Robinson, to help his godchild Billie, who has a drug problem. [S]

programme.title: The Gold Robbers
programme.desc: The Midas Touch. 1969. Stars Peter Vaughan, Richard Leech & Paul Stassino. Cradock has got his man - the brains behind the heist. But he knows all too well there's someone bigger still at large. [S]

programme.title: Playtime
